isaacvetter commented on Issue #216

Hey Tony,

This is not part of the ballot. The only thing being balloted is the spec page. That's this page: http://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html

I take your meaning that this is non-standard. The table of contents is the menu system.

I'm not sure what would resolve this negative comment ... Can you add more detail?

Isaac

wmaethner commented on Issue #216

Like #219 and #218 and #217, this is outside of the proposed ballot

wmaethner labeled Issue #216

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Isaac Vetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Reinhard Egelkraut

Disposition: Not related
Disposition Comment: Will look for further clarification

:+1: For: 6
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
